body: Cock and Ball Torture: By Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia at en.wikipedia.org. Cock and ball torture (CBT) is a sexual activity involving torture of the male genitals. This may involve directly painful activities, such as wax play, genital spanking, squeezing, ball-busting, genital flogging, urethral play, tickle torture, erotic electrostimulation or even kicking. The recipient of such activities, may receive direct physical pleasure via masochism, through knowledge that the play is pleasing to a sadistic dominant. Image: Electrosimulation applied on a penis.
